text: The House in the Snow-Drifts () is a 1928 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Fridrikh Ermler.ДОМ В СУГРОБАХДом в сугробах (1928) The movie is based on the short story "The Cave" by Yevgeny Zamyatin. It stars Fyodor Nikitin, Tatyana Okova, and Valeri Solovtsov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1928 drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Fridrikh Ermler Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The House in the Snow-Drifts
